body_content.explanation: in a way that affects everyone who is present and makes them want to join in, or makes them feel the same way:
examples: I felt better after spending an evening with my infectiously cheerful housemates.
The girl grinned infectiously and I smiled back at her.
The toddler laughed infectiously when she saw the horse walk into the house.

body_content.explanation: in a way that passes a disease from one person, animal, or plant to another:
examples: The army doctors will not let an infectiously sick person return to active duty.
The virus can be transmitted infectiously.
